constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of 2no. semi-detached two-storey single family dwelling houses with associated parking, cycle provision and refuse storage
decision_conditions: Due to the design and dimensions of the proposed vehicular access and hardstanding there would not be adequate space to manoeuvre/turn on site in order that cars could enter and exit each property in forward gear which would result in an unacceptable impact on highway safety, thereby conflicting with Paragraph 109 of the NPPF 2019 and policies DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

1 letter has been received from an adjoining neighbour raising concerns regarding impact on amenity. Therefore the Council is permitted to assess the proposals as per Paragraph A.4 - (7) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Please provide a payment of Â£145 to accompany your application. This payment can be made online at www.kingston.gov.uk or by calling our Customer Care Line on 020 8547 5022
